ch.iserver.ace.net.core
Class NetworkServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
  ch.iserver.ace.net.core.NetworkServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
NetworkServiceExt, NetworkService
public class NetworkServiceImpl
extends Object
implements NetworkServiceExt

Default implementation for interface NetworkService. This class is the main entry point to the network layer for the upper layer.

getServerInfo

public ServerInfo getServerInfo()
Gets the local server info object. It may take some time to initialize this property. So it is the responsibility of the clients of this service to query the network service periodically until the property is set.

Specified by:
getServerInfo in interface NetworkService
Returns:
the local server info

setUserId

public void setUserId(String id)
Sets the user id of the local user. This method has to be called before starting the service with the NetworkService.start() method. Note, it is an error to set the user id twice!

Specified by:
setUserId in interface NetworkService
Parameters:
id - the id of the local user

setCallback

public void setCallback(NetworkServiceCallback callback)
Description copied from interface: NetworkService
Sets the callback for events from the network layer. It further initiates the discovery process for remote users.

Specified by:
setCallback in interface NetworkService
Parameters:
callback - the callback object for events from the network layer

discoverUser

public void discoverUser(DiscoveryNetworkCallback callback,
                         InetAddress addr,
                         int port)
Initiates an explicit discovery of a user. The network layer tries to contact the given host on the given port. The result is communicated to the DiscoveryNetworkCallback objects.

Specified by:
discoverUser in interface NetworkService
Parameters:
callback - the DiscoveryNetworkCallback to be notified
addr - the target address
port - the target port

publish

public DocumentServer publish(DocumentServerLogic logic,
                              DocumentDetails details)
Publishes a document in the network layer. A published document must be reachable from the network. The passed in logic object is used by the network layer to access the document server functionality in the logic layer. The returned DocumentServer object will be used by the caller to control the created network layer server functionality.

Specified by:
publish in interface NetworkService
Parameters:
logic - the DocumentServerLogic providing access to logic layer functionality
details - the document details
Returns:
a DocumentServer instance that allows the caller to control the network layer server functionality

getMainThreadDomain

public ThreadDomain getMainThreadDomain()
Returns the main thread domain to be used by the discovery component as well as the main request handler.

Specified by:
getMainThreadDomain in interface NetworkServiceExt
Returns:
the ThreadDomain to be used

isStopped

public boolean isStopped()
Returns whether the network layer is stopped. If true, no messages from the physical network shall be received and processed anymore.

Specified by:
isStopped in interface NetworkServiceExt
Returns:
true iff the network layer is stopped

Gets the TimestampFactory.

Specified by:

Returns:
the TimestampFactory
See Also:
TimestampFactory

conceal

public void conceal(String docId)
Conceals a document from the local user. This method does not cause any physical network traffic and is used for management purpose.

Specified by:
conceal in interface NetworkServiceExt
Parameters:
docId - the id of the document to conceal
